headers.subject: Re: privacy on Freenode IRC

headers.reply-to: scott@guppylog.com, "Ubuntu user technical support, not for general discussions" <ubuntu-users@lists.ubuntu.com>
headers.list-id: "Ubuntu user technical support, not for general discussions" <ubuntu-users.lists.ubuntu.com>

body.para: On Mon, 2007-05-28 at 23:17 +0200, Patrick Frank wrote:

quote.quotepara: And I wonder why people like me have to deal with abusive staff members on IRC networks if they want to get involved with Free and Open Source Projects like Ubuntu

body.para: IRC in general, regardless of the network involved, only provides pain and frustration for anyone who ends up running afoul of the network admins, or the pet abusive users. My suggestion is not to use IRC for anything, at all, ever. We'd all be much happier if IRC stopped working overnight. Use teh google.
